weapon.name: Moonstar Bracelet
weapon.description: A strange nanoweapon that generates blades that cut through metal like butter. In the past, it used to take the form of a bracelet that wrapped around its owner's wrist while in standby mode, and that is where its owner's descriptions of it come from.

weaponEffects.title: Altered Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase ATK by **20%** and altered resistance by **30%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more altered weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Altered Resonance or Altered Reaction effects, with Altered Resonance taking precedence.

normals.name: Frost Lash
normals.description:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch **7** consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **69.9%** of ATK plus **419**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **73.4%** of ATK plus **440**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **115.4%** of ATK plus **692**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **174.2%** of ATK plus **1045**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **195.7%** of ATK plus **1174**.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to **131.1%** of ATK plus **787**.
Seventh Attack: Deal damage equal to **505.9%** of ATK plus **3035**.

normals.name: Dancing Drop
normals.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to launch **7** consecutive attacks in mid-air and consume endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **93.8%** of ATK plus **563**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **98.4%** of ATK plus **590**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to**141.8%** of ATK plus **851**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **202.2%** of ATK plus **1213**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **196.9%** of ATK plus **1181**.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to **146.5%** of ATK plus **879**.
Seventh Attack: Deal damage equal to **548.5%** of ATK plus **3291**.

normals.name: Converging Ripples
normals.description:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack between the second and sixth normal attack to trigger Converging Ripples.
The Wanderer will become airborne and fire several water bombs ahead while continuously consuming endurance, each hit dealing damage equal to **88.5%** of ATK plus **531** to nearby targets (counts as a charged attack), knocking the targets back.

normals.name: Moonrain
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Moonrain.
Fall from above, dealing damage equal to **175%** of ATK plus **1050** to targets upon reaching the ground, and suspend them.

normals.name: Torrential Convergence
normals.description:
While in mid-air, tap and hold normal attack between the second and sixth normal attack to trigger Torrential Convergence.
Fire several water bombs ahead while continuously consuming endurance, each hit dealing damage equal to **88.5%** of ATK plus **531** to nearby targets (counts as a charged attack), knocking the targets back.

normals.name: Division
normals.description:
While **Benediction Resonance** is active:
Tap and hold normal attack while on the ground to select a teammate, then release to link the Wanderer to that teammate. When their link is in effect, the pair cannot make a link or be linked again. The link ends when one of the two is defeated/the selected ally has made another link/it exceeds the range.
The linked ally's healing received from the link starter's Moonstar Bracelet is increased by **50%**.
When the linked ally activates **Fortitude Resonance**, an extra **50%** of resistance is transmitted to the linked ally.
When the linked ally activates **Balance Resonance**/**Attack Resonance**, an extra **20%** of ATK is transmitted to the linked ally (no more than **20,000**).
When the linked ally activates **Benediction Resonance**, the outgoing healing effect of the pair is additionally increased by **30%**.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.
**Passive**: Recover HP equal to **150%** of ATK for the Wanderer and nearby allies when dodging, and remove **8** points of Graying Bite from the Wanderer. While **Benediction Resonance** is active, gain an additional **50** weapon charge.

dodge.name: Reversal Wave
dodge.description: Roam ahead several times, dealing damage up to **144%** of ATK plus **864** to targets in the area.

dodge.name: Dashing Wave
dodge.description: Unleash a water jet, dealing damage up to **81%** of ATK plus **486** to targets in the area and suspending them.

skill.name: Crashing Falls
skill.description:
Tidal Eruption: Deal damage equal to **416%** of ATK plus **2496** and **strongly suspend** targets in the area. Cooldown: **30** seconds.
**Passive: Scatter**
Gain Scatter Technique after equipping **Moonstar Bracelet**. Up to **2** out of **6** Scatter Techniques can be activated via Skills - Settings.
Controls: Tap the special skill button to use the Scatter Technique.
When a Scatter Technique is attached to Crashing Falls, using Crashing Falls will automatically trigger the Scatter Technique, and the skill cooldown will be replaced by the Scatter Technique cooldown.

skill.name: Hydro Focus
skill.description:
Surging Tides: Deal damage up to **320%** of ATK plus **1920** to nearby targets, increasing all elemental damage by **6%** for **20** seconds.
Cooldown: **14** seconds.

skill.name: Vortex
skill.description:
Summon multiple waterspouts, pulling nearby targets together and dealing damage up to **415.4%** of ATK plus **2492**. A large waterspout is formed shortly after, dealing damage equal to **184.6%** of ATK plus **1108** to nearby targets.
Damage dealt by **Vortex** counts as skill and discharge damage.
Cooldown: **12** seconds.

skill.name: Torrential Force
skill.description:
Bath in Torrents: Gain **60** weapon charge every second. Increase skill damage by **12%** for **35** seconds.
Using **Torrential Force** counts as using the current weapon's discharge skill (without the effect).
**Shimmering Radiance** hits reset **Torrential Force's** cooldown.
Cooldown: **30** seconds.

skill.name: Maelstrom
skill.description:
Encompassing Waves: Gain a final damage boost that increases over time, up to **26%** (maxes out in **10** seconds). This effect does not stack with repeated uses of **Maelstrom** and is lost upon switching weapons.
Cooldown: **30** seconds.

skill.name: Aqua Shackles
skill.description:
Execute Aqua Prison on the target for **3** seconds. The target is unable to move or use skills for the duration of Aqua Prison, and their resistance is reduced by **8%** for **15** seconds (doesn't work against Wanderers).
The resistance-reducing effect of **Aqua Shackles** is doubled while diving.
Cooldown: **15** seconds.

skill.name: Wellspring
skill.description:
Arcane Vitality: Gain a (**Max HP**/**100,000**)% all elemental damage boost, up to **9%**. Gain another **7%** increase to all elemental damage for **20** seconds when your Max HP is over **1,600,**000****.
Cooldown: **15** seconds.

discharge.name: Shimmering Radiance
discharge.description:
When **weapon charge is full** or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and unleash Moonstar's Breath, dealing damage up to **736%** of ATK plus **4416** to nearby targets. During this period, gain damage immunity for **1.5** seconds (unavailable in Apex League). Recover the Wanderer's HP equal to **300%** of ATK and remove **16** points of Graying Bite. Remove delay and gain delay immunity for **5** seconds.

**Passive: Moonstar**
While **Attack**/**Balance** Resonance is active, when **Shimmering Radiance** lands a hit, increase the Wanderer's ATK by **15%** for **30** seconds.
While **Fortitude Resonance** is active, every time the Wanderer uses **Shimmering Radiance**, increase their resistance by **4%** for **30** seconds, stacking up to **5** times. When the Wanderer's HP is lower than **30%**, gain an extra **40%** damage reduction for **5** seconds, which can be triggered once every **60** seconds.
While **Benediction Resonance** is active, **Shimmering Radiance's** HP recovery heals all teammates instead and when it is used, creates **1** stack of Moonshield that negates damage **1** time for **10** seconds. This effect does not stack, and every use of **Shimmering Radiance** increases the healing effect of the next use by **20%**, up to **40%**. This effect lasts for **30** seconds.

advancements.description:
Using any weapon or discharge skill grants **1** elemental crystal, up to **5** crystals. Elemental crystals are lost at a rate of **1** crystal every **6** seconds.
Elemental crystals provide a final damage boost equal to **4%** of [(**crystal count** plus **1**)/**2**] and an increased healing effect equal to **6%** of [(**crystal count** plus **1**)/**2**].
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

While Benediction Resonance is not active, when the target's HP is below (**crystal count** plus **2**)**%**, using **Moonstar Bracelet** can instantly execute the target (doesn't work against Wanderers).
While Benediction Resonance is active, when the target's HP is below (**crystal count** times **2** plus **2**)**%**, using **Moonstar Bracelet** can instantly execute the target (doesn't work against Wanderers).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

Obtain **1** elemental crystal every time Scatter Technique is used. Elemental crystals are lost at a rate of **1** crystal every **20** seconds.
When receiving lethal damage, consume **3** elemental crystals to prevent death **1** time and gain damage immunity for a short time. Can be activated **1** time every **25** seconds.
Increase final damage by **7%** of [(**crystal count **plus **3**)/**2**].

matrice.name: Fiona
matrice.description: A powerful Executor and an outstanding Archon.

set.set_2: After dealing damage, increase attack by **16%**/**18%**/**20%**/**22%** for **3000** seconds. This effect does not stack. Only the effect with the highest star rating is applied when obtained repeatedly.
set.set_4: While Benediction Resonance is not active, after using Scatter Technique, increase final damage by **17%**/**19%**/**21%**/**23%** for **2000** seconds. While Benediction Resonance is active, after using Scatter Technique, increase final damage for self and teammates by **9%**/**10%**/**11%**/**12%** for **2000** seconds. Final damage is additionally increased based on base attack by (Base ATK/**10,000**)%, up to **5%**. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
